description: Ministers agree a plan to ban temporary workers at slaughterhouses after a spate of cases.
title: Coronavirus: Virus outbreaks push Germany to clean up abattoirs
title_page: Coronavirus: Virus outbreaks push Germany to clean up abattoirs - BBC News
maintext: She travelled 18 hours by car from Bucharest to see the conditions for herself, telling Deutsche Welle that any Romanian who encountered health or hygiene issues should turn to the police if necessary.
